questions.question: She is …………………………….. beautiful woman I have ever met.
questions.description: Here we use most to make the superlative form of beautiful. ‘The’ is used before superlative adjectives.

questions.question: ……………………………. cheese is made from cow’s milk.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: ……………………………….. North Indians understand Hindi.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: Who is ………………………………… intelligent girl in the class?
questions.description: Here we use most to make the superlative form of beautiful. ‘The’ is used before superlative adjectives.

questions.question: ………………………………… of the people here know each other.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: ………………………………… of us supported him.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: Which country produces ……………………………. milk?
questions.description: When most has a superlative meaning, it is normally used with the.

questions.question: ……………………………. children love chocolates.
questions.description: When most simply means ‘the majority of’, it is not used with ‘the’.

questions.question: …………………………….. of us want a new system.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: She wasn’t as rich as the others, but she was …………………………….. generous.
questions.description: Here we use most to make the superlative form of beautiful. ‘The’ is used before superlative adjectives.

questions.question: Thank you for ……………………………….. wonderful evening.
questions.description: When most means very it is not used with the.
